name: Slip 'n Sword
description:
a game made in 48 hours by Crab Gang

As a trusty sword, you’ve seen better days. You’ve decided it’s time to retire, but these pesky adventurers keep bringing you along on their journeys. Enough is enough!

Each strike brings you closer to breaking, but you have a plan; by sabotaging the adventurers' attacks at just the right moment, you can make them anxious enough to sweat up a storm, and eventually lose their grip!

Do you have what it takes to make it to retirement? And what happens to those adventurers you leave behind, anyway?

Controls:
Any Key: navigate menus
Space: sabotage attacks & ride the gush rush

#LOWREZJAM
Optional Themes: You are the Weapon, Slippery, Life as an NPC.
